languages.text: "Поступим так: если после двух раундов у нас будет ничья, то если вы попадете третьим выстрелом — победа ваша. В Каликсисе мы звали это "преимущество нападающего" — хорошая практика, она учит арбитров, что если выпал шанс стрелять первым, то ты обязан поразить цель".

"We'll do it this way: if it's a draw after two rounds, if you land the third shot, the victory is yours. In Calixis we called this the attacker's advantage — a good way of teaching Arbitrators that if you get the chance to shoot first, you must hit the target."
languages.original_text: "Поступим так: если после двух раундов у нас будет ничья, то если вы попадете третьим выстрелом — победа ваша. В Каликсисе мы звали это "преимущество нападающего" — хорошая практика, она учит арбитров, что если выпал шанс стрелять первым, то ты обязан поразить цель".

traits.locale_text: "We'll do it this way: if it's a draw after two rounds, if you land the third shot, the victory is yours. In Calixis we called this the attacker's advantage — a good way of teaching Arbitrators that if you get the chance to shoot first, you must hit the target."

"We'll do it this way: if it's a draw after two rounds, if you land the third shot, the victory is yours. In Calixis we called this the attacker's advantage — a good way of teaching Arbitrators that if you get the chance to shoot first, you must hit the target."

"We'll do it this way: if it's a draw after two rounds, if you land the third shot, the victory is yours. In Calixis we called this the attacker's advantage — a good way of teaching Arbitrators that if you get the chance to shoot first, you must hit the target."

"We'll do it this way: if it's a draw after two rounds, if you land the third shot, the victory is yours. In Calixis we called this the attacker's advantage — a good way of teaching Arbitrators that if you get the chance to shoot first, you must hit the target."

"We'll do it this way: if it's a draw after two rounds, if you land the third shot, the victory is yours. In Calixis we called this the attacker's advantage — a good way of teaching Arbitrators that if you get the chance to shoot first, you must hit the target."

languages.text: 「こうしましょう。二ラウンド終えて引き分けだった場合、三発目を命中させた方の勝ちとします。キャリクシスではこれを『攻撃側の優位』と呼んでいます。先に撃つチャンスを得たなら、必ず命中させろとアービトレイターに教える良い方法なのです」
languages.original_text: "We'll do it this way: if it's a draw after two rounds, if you land the third shot, the victory is yours. In Calixis we called this the attacker's advantage — a good way of teaching Arbitrators that if you get the chance to shoot first, you must hit the target."

traits.locale_text: 「こうしましょう。二ラウンド終えて引き分けだった場合、三発目を命中させた方の勝ちとします。キャリクシスではこれを『攻撃側の優位』と呼んでいます。先に撃つチャンスを得たなら、必ず命中させろとアービトレイターに教える良い方法なのです」

languages.text: "Şöyle yapacağız: Eğer iki turun sonunda berabere olursak üçüncü atışı siz yapın, tutturursanız kazanırsınız. Calixis'te buna saldırganın avantajı deriz. Yargıcılara ilk atışı yapma şansına nail olduklarında hedef vurmaları gerektiğini öğretmenin iyi bir yoludur."
languages.original_text: "We'll do it this way: if it's a draw after two rounds, if you land the third shot, the victory is yours. In Calixis we called this the attacker's advantage — a good way of teaching Arbitrators that if you get the chance to shoot first, you must hit the target."

traits.locale_text: "Şöyle yapacağız: Eğer iki turun sonunda berabere olursak üçüncü atışı siz yapın, tutturursanız kazanırsınız. Calixis'te buna saldırganın avantajı deriz. Yargıcılara ilk atışı yapma şansına nail olduklarında hedef vurmaları gerektiğini öğretmenin iyi bir yoludur."

languages.text: «Lo haremos de la siguiente manera: si estamos empatados después de dos rondas, si acierta el tercer disparo, la victoria es suya. En Calixis lo llamábamos la ventaja del atacante; una buena forma de enseñar a los Arbitrator que, si tenían la oportunidad de disparar primero, debían acertar».
languages.original_text: "We'll do it this way: if it's a draw after two rounds, if you land the third shot, the victory is yours. In Calixis we called this the attacker's advantage — a good way of teaching Arbitrators that if you get the chance to shoot first, you must hit the target."

traits.locale_text: «Lo haremos de la siguiente manera: si estamos empatados después de dos rondas, si acierta el tercer disparo, la victoria es suya. En Calixis lo llamábamos la ventaja del atacante; una buena forma de enseñar a los Arbitrator que, si tenían la oportunidad de disparar primero, debían acertar».

languages.text: “规则是这样的：如果两轮之后双方平局，那只要你先击中第三枪，你就赢了。在卡利西斯，我们管这个叫先手优势。这是给所有法务官的教导——如果有机会先开枪，那一定要击中目标。”
languages.original_text: "We'll do it this way: if it's a draw after two rounds, if you land the third shot, the victory is yours. In Calixis we called this the attacker's advantage — a good way of teaching Arbitrators that if you get the chance to shoot first, you must hit the target."

traits.locale_text: “规则是这样的：如果两轮之后双方平局，那只要你先击中第三枪，你就赢了。在卡利西斯，我们管这个叫先手优势。这是给所有法务官的教导——如果有机会先开枪，那一定要击中目标。”

languages.text: « Nous allons procéder de la manière suivante : si les deux premières manches se soldent par une égalité, vous serez {mf|déclaré|déclarée} vainqueur à condition de faire mouche à la troisième. À Calixis, on appelle ça l'avantage de l'attaquant. C'est un bon moyen d'apprendre aux arbitrators que, lorsqu'on a la chance de tirer le premier, il ne faut surtout pas rater sa cible. »
languages.original_text: "We'll do it this way: if it's a draw after two rounds, if you land the third shot, the victory is yours. In Calixis we called this the attacker's advantage — a good way of teaching Arbitrators that if you get the chance to shoot first, you must hit the target."

traits.locale_text: « Nous allons procéder de la manière suivante : si les deux premières manches se soldent par une égalité, vous serez {mf|déclaré|déclarée} vainqueur à condition de faire mouche à la troisième. À Calixis, on appelle ça l'avantage de l'attaquant. C'est un bon moyen d'apprendre aux arbitrators que, lorsqu'on a la chance de tirer le premier, il ne faut surtout pas rater sa cible. »

languages.text: "Wir machen es so: steht es nach zwei Runden unentschieden, habt Ihr gewonnen, wenn der dritte Schuss sitzt. In Calixis bezeichnen wir das als den Vorteil des Angreifers ... ein guter Weg, Arbitratoren zu lehren, dass man das Ziel treffen muss, wenn man die Chance auf den ersten Schuss hat."
languages.original_text: "We'll do it this way: if it's a draw after two rounds, if you land the third shot, the victory is yours. In Calixis we called this the attacker's advantage — a good way of teaching Arbitrators that if you get the chance to shoot first, you must hit the target."

traits.locale_text: "Wir machen es so: steht es nach zwei Runden unentschieden, habt Ihr gewonnen, wenn der dritte Schuss sitzt. In Calixis bezeichnen wir das als den Vorteil des Angreifers ... ein guter Weg, Arbitratoren zu lehren, dass man das Ziel treffen muss, wenn man die Chance auf den ersten Schuss hat."
